hkparam.name: eventNames
hkparam.hkcstring: MC 1HM PowerAttackRight Release to MC 1HM PowerAttackRight.hkx
MC 1HM AttackRight Anticipation to MC 1HM PowerAttackRight.hkx

hkobject.hkparam: bowZoomAmt = IsAttacking * clamp( (bowZoomAmt + (ZoomAcc * TimeDelta * ((iWantBlock * bowZoom ) - bowZoomAmt) * clamp((1 - cos( bowZoomAmt * 3.14/2) ), 0.1, 1) ) ), 0, 1)
